parameters: \n<Guild Master>So, we missed collecting the goblin's nose.
\n< Serena >I wasn't really into it from the beginning.

\n< Serena >Even though it was to confirm the extermination,
bringing back a part of the corpse...
\n< Serena >It's a bit too rough for my taste.
\n<Guild Master>The opponent is a monster, you know?
\n< Serena >That's precisely why.

\n< Serena >Precisely because of that, we must show those
monsters our pride as bearers of civilization and
protectors of culture.
\n< Serena >Isn't that right?
\n<Guild Master>.......

\n<Guild Master>Well... you can have your own principles and
beliefs.

\n<Guild Master>Anyway, it was decided. The request was to bring
back 10 goblin noses for a contract of 3G, right?

\n<Guild Master>Since you didn't bring anything back, the reward
is also zero.

\n< Serena >Hmph. Well, it's my own choice. I have no
objections. I never relied on rewards to begin
with.

\n< Serena >However, in any case, we exterminated them and
helped people along the way.

\n< Serena >Make sure to keep a solid record of the mission
accomplishment.

\n<Guild Master>That's right. Normally, it should be recorded as a
failure...

\n<Guild Master>Since there were witnesses this time, let's
consider it a success. It's truly unheard of. To
have a request succeed without any reward.

\n< Serena >So, we're only \V[2501] requests away from
fulfilling our promise.

\n< Serena >If we complete \V[2501] more requests, we will
issue a promissory note to the eastern town.
\n< Serena >No doubt about it, right?

\n<Guild Master>No doubt about it. How many times have we had this
exchange...

\n< Serena >I'm in a hurry. No matter how many times I check,
it's not enough.
\n< Serena >Only \V[2501] more requests...
\n<Guild Master>And then, take this with you.
\n< Serena >What is this?

\n<Guild Master>It's the identification given to adventurers who
have completed their first job... Well, it's like
an ID card.

\n<Guild Master>Achievements and evaluations are also written
here. Don't lose it.

\n< Serena >So this is the proof of becoming a full-fledged
adventurer. Understood.
\n< Serena >Well.

\n< Serena >That's it for today. I need to rest up for
tomorrow.
\n< Serena >Eat, take a bath, sleep.

\n< Serena >Oh, right. I also need a spare ring. Without this,
I can't use my Sonic Fist.
\n< Serena >Geez, adventurers are unexpectedly busy.

\n< Serena >For now, let's find an inn. We'll do everything
after that.
依頼開始

\n<Guild Master>Yo, good morning. Have you gotten used to this
town?

\n< Serena >It's still the same day as yesterday. I haven't
gotten used to it yet, or maybe I never will.
\n<Guild Master>Hehe, of course.
\n< Serena >Show me the quests.
依頼　序盤

\n<Guild Master>The request isn't finished yet, right? Come back
once you've completed the request.
イベント終了
Tavern waitressen(v[2285]===0)
Farmer's Helperen(v[2282]===0)
Cancel
Bar waitress en(v[2285]===0)
\n< Serena >Hey, what's up with this request?

\n<Guild Master>Hey hey, it doesn't seem like you've been to the
tavern, right?

\n< Serena >I went to the tavern the other day. I didn't stay
for long though.

\n<Guild Master>I see... Well, it's nothing important... You're
still young after all...

\n<Guild Master>If you don't understand on your own, maybe this
kind of job isn't suitable for a young person like
you, miss.

\n<Guild Master>Basically, it's a request to listen to the
customer's order and bring drinks and food to
their table. It's a request to help out at the
tavern.

\n< Serena >You want me to pretend to be a waitress? Me, of
all people?

\n<Guild Master>No one asked you to do it, miss. If you don't like
it, you don't have to do it.

\n< Serena >Hmmm. But it seems interesting. It's a job that I
wouldn't have the chance to do if I stayed at the
mansion my whole life.

\n< Serena >And... um, that fluttery outfit... I wonder if I
could wear that...

\n<Guild Master>I don't know which clothes, but I think you'll be
given a uniform. I'm not sure if there's one that
fits your size, miss...

\n<Guild Master>By the way, the reward is based on performance. It
depends on how much you can earn.
Take the job
I won't take it
Take on

\n< Serena >Very well. I will accept this request. I will
contact the client.

\n<Guild Master>In that case, take this paper as it is. The
conversation should go smoothly with it.
\n< Serena >I see. Well then, I'll be going.
\n<Guild Master>Ah, be careful, okay?

\n<Guild Master>...Ah, that's not good. I feel like I'm sending my
child out for the first time.
イベント終了
Not take
イベント終了
Helping a farmer en(v[2282]===0)
\n< Serena >Help the farmer?
\n<Guild Master>What, are you interested in that kind of job?

\n< Serena >Regardless of whether it exists or not, it's too
vague and doesn't make sense.
\n< Serena >What kind of request is this?
\n<Guild Master>Um, this time... it's milking cows.

\n<Guild Master>Farmers are always short-handed, you know. That's
why we keep getting these requests one after
another.

\n<Guild Master>And most of the adventurers who take on these
requests are former farmers.

\n<Guild Master>For beginners who are just starting out and don't
have much money, they earn pocket change by taking
on these small requests.
\n< Serena >Hmmm.
\n<Guild Master>That's why we only accept former farmers.

\n<Guild Master>This is a job that girls like you wouldn't have
any connection to.
\n< Serena >It's not like that.

\n< Serena >I'm used to dealing with livestock because of my
family's business.

\n< Serena >Well, I've never touched a cow before, but if you
just show me how to move my hands, I'm confident
that I can handle it perfectly fine.

\n<Guild Master>Well, even though the reward is only 1G, are you
seriously considering taking on this request?
Take on
Decline
Take on

\n< Serena >I'll take it. The reward may be small, but I'm
sure the evaluation will be high.

\n< Serena >This request is like a dream come true for me
right now.

\n<Guild Master>Well, even if you fail, it's not like someone will
die. And the former farmers are also not
available.

\n<Guild Master>It's better than postponing it until tomorrow.
Here, take the request certificate and go.
\n< Serena >Should I show this to the client?

\n<Guild Master>Ah, the client is doing odd jobs in the field, so
if you show them that, they should guide you to
the workplace.

\n< Serena >Understood, it's the field. Well then, I'll be
off.
\n<Guild Master>Ah, have a safe journey.
イベント終了
Not take
イベント終了
Cancel
イベント終了
依頼　序盤

You haven't finished the request yet, have you? Or
did you come to ask about how to use items during
battle?
I want to ask about how to use items
I don't have anything in particular
How to use the item

\n<Guild Master>First, you need to set the item you want to use in
the slot. To do that, open the menu and select the
slot option.

\n<Guild Master>Then, it will become the list screen of the
available registered items. Choose the necessary
item and register it in the slot. With this, the
preparation is complete.

\n<Guild Master>During battle, you use items from the slot. Select
them with the 1, 2, or L/R buttons, and activate
the item's effect with the slot use key.
No special need
イベント終了
Goblin Subjugationen(v[2284]===0)
Cancel
Goblin extermination en(v[2284]===0)
\n< Serena >Did another goblin appear?

\n<Guild Master>Lately, there have been quite a few... I wonder if
some women have been captured somewhere. We also
have some missing persons, you know...
\n< Serena >Do goblins increase when women are captured?
\n<Guild Master>Well...
\n< Serena >....

\n<Guild Master>...Hmm...Ah...Well...What can I say? That's just
how it is.
\n< Serena >？？？

\n<Guild Master>Anyway, the one that appeared this time is also a
stray.

\n<Guild Master>Even though they are just a few goblins, if they
come across women and children, there is a
possibility of losing their lives.

\n<Guild Master>There's nothing better than getting rid of them
quickly. The reward for success is 3G. Is it okay
for you to accept this request?
Accept
Decline
Take on

\n< Serena >Of course. There's no reason to refuse. Let's
accept that request.
\n<Guild Master>I'm counting on you.

\n<Guild Master>By the way, do you know how to use items during
battles, Miss?
I don't know
I know
I don't know
\n<Guild Master>Alright, then I'll give you a brief explanation.

\n<Guild Master>During battles, you can use items from the slots.
If you're using a keyboard, press 1 or 2. If
you're using a gamepad, use the L and R buttons to
select and the slot use button to activate the
item's effect.

\n<Guild Master>There are two slots. You need to register the
items you want to put in the slots in advance from
the menu screen.

\n<Guild Master>The method is simple. Just enter the slot item in
the menu screen, press the register button, and
select the item.

\n<Guild Master>Oh, by the way, it goes without saying, but you
can't register if you don't have any items
beforehand.

\n<Guild Master>Items are sold at the tool shop. Make sure to buy
at least one before going on an adventure.

\n<Guild Master>If you're stingy even though it's expensive,
you'll end up paying an even higher price.
\n< Serena >I roughly understand. Thank you, Master.
\n<Guild Master>Oh, come back safely.
I know

\n<Guild Master>I see. Well then, it seems like you'll be fine.
Come back safely.
イベント終了
Not take
イベント終了
Cancel
イベント終了
依頼　三つ終了後

\n<Guild Master>Don't you know the location? It's in the west
direction.
\n< Serena >I know.
Transporting luggage to the Minotaur Forest
Transporting goods to the Minotaur Forest
\n< Serena >...Hmm.
\n< Serena >Minotaur? This is...
\n<Guild Master>This is Erika's request. The reward is 1G.

\n<Guild Master>Can you deliver supplies and bento to the forest
camp?

\n< Serena >Are you leaving the supply to someone else? Does
that mean Erika-sama will be confined to the
forest?

\n<Guild Master>...Ricotte's older sister was killed by a
Minotaur.

\n<Guild Master>Search for the enemy until your physical limits,
occasionally come down to the town and take a
little rest, then head back to the forest.
\n< Serena >So there was such a situation...

\n<Guild Master>There's no one without circumstances. Especially
those who are adventurers.
\n<Guild Master>It's the same for you, right?
\n< Serena >Don't step in so much?
\n<Guild Master>Dealing with adults is like that.
\n<Guild Master>Well, we've gotten off track.

\n<Guild Master>The job is simply transporting supplies. There
shouldn't be much danger.
\n< Serena >How much is the amount of supplies?
\n<Guild Master>Just a small bag. It's mostly delivering lunch.

\n< Serena >Understood. In that case, I'll take the job. Geez,
can't be helped.
\n<Guild Master>Hmph...
\n< Serena >What is it?

\n<Guild Master>...It's nothing. Their camp is always in the same
place.

\n<Guild Master>The location is in the western forest. I'll give
you a map, so follow it and go there.
\n< Serena >Understood.

\n<Guild Master>This is the luggage... I don't think I need to
worry about you, but don't handle it too roughly,
okay?
イベント終了
依頼　ミノタウロス捜索終了後

\n<Guild Master>How about you have a little more fun, laugh, and
try acting like a child?
\n<Guild Master>Yo, miss, there's a message for you.
\n< Serena >Me?

\n<Guild Master>Did you save a woman from goblins? She wants to
thank you for that favor.
\n< Serena >I see. Please let her know that I don't mind.

\n<Guild Master>You're not very friendly. The key to selling
products is friendliness and charm. You'll only be
adored for a limited time, you know?

\n< Serena >Yeah... even if you say that, it's just my nature.
I don't have time.
\n< Serena >Master, show me the request instead.
\n<Guild Master>Well, the job that I could give you is gone now.
\n< Serena >What?

\n<Guild Master>In a rural town like this, there aren't originally
that many requests. There are actually more days
without work.

\n<Guild Master>Well, it's better than having a mountain of
neglected requests, I suppose.
\n< Serena >It's not good for me. What should I do?

\n<Guild Master>In this case, you'll just have to wait. But that
doesn't mean you'll be left waiting for days on
end.

\n<Guild Master>The request to subdue the thieves is a bit
difficult. I'm thinking of sending someone to
check on the situation soon...
\n< Serena >It doesn't matter even if it's today.

\n<Guild Master>Listen, the guild doesn't just issue requests as
they please.

\n<Guild Master>We operate within the limits of budget, processing
capacity, and regulations. We strive for maximum
efficiency within those constraints.

\n<Guild Master>Ah well... Anyway, for today, go home. Or rather,
go. The hardworking girl like you needs a break.

\n< Serena >...I see... So that's how it is. Did you plan
this?
\n< Serena >Mind your own business...

\n< Serena >...Well, it's fine. I've already completed one
request today. And about that woman... come to
think of it, I didn't ask for her name...

\n< Serena >Anyway, it would be a lie to say that I wasn't
curious about that woman.
\n< Serena >Fine. I'll let you meddle in my affairs for today.

\n< Serena >However, I would like you to prepare the request
by tomorrow.
\n<Guild Master>Ah, I understand, I understand.

\n<Guild Master>That person's house is on the south side of town.
Well, take your time and relax.

\n< Serena >Geez... Everyone treats me like a child just
because I'm a little short and spoils me.
依頼　妊婦救助後

\n<Guild Master>The request isn't finished yet, right? Come back
once you've completed the request.
イベント終了
Orc Scouten(v[2283]===0)
Distribution of poisonen(v[2288]===0)
Cancel
Orc Scout en(v[2283]===0)
\n< Serena >Orc? What kind of monster is this?

\n<Guild Master>What... You don't know about orcs? This is the
first time someone has asked for an explanation.

\n<Guild Master>Well... You can think of it as a goblin that has
grown up in appearance. It seems to be a different
race though.
\n< Serena >Hmmm.

\n<Guild Master>They are muscular and their nature can be
described as ferocious. They are extremely
aggressive monsters. They willingly attack people.

\n<Guild Master>So, it seems that orc scouts are wandering around
this area. Please defeat them before it becomes a
big problem, or at least drive them away.

\n< Serena >Scouts? So that means there must be a main force
somewhere.

\n<Guild Master>I'm not sure. We don't know the habits of
monsters. But before a large outbreak of orcs,
small groups tend to appear.

\n<Guild Master>I don't know if they call for their comrades or if
they breed, but we call them scouts, anyway.
\n< Serena >Hmmm... What about the location and number?

\n<Guild Master>It's in the eastern forest. There are two of them.
It seems like they are just wandering around for
now.

\n<Guild Master>The reward is 1G per orc. With a successful
completion bonus, it's 2G. In total, it's 4G. So,
what do you think? Will you give it a try?
I'll do it
Not doing it
Take it

\n< Serena >Hmmm... I can't just leave it alone. I'll take it.
I'll accept it...
\n<Guild Master>What is it?

\n< Serena >If they are said to be such ferocious opponents, I
would like to investigate more about the enemy.

\n< Serena >Do we have any books or documents? Even reports
from previous encounters would be fine.

\n<Guild Master>Ah... We don't have any books, but there is
someone in town who is knowledgeable about that
kind of thing.
\n< Serena >Oh.

\n<Guild Master>His name is Tomo, but everyone calls him the
Monster Doctor. Well, it's partly just teasing.

\n<Guild Master>I wonder how many people in this town can say they
are knowledgeable about monsters.
\n< Serena >...The conversation doesn't flow well.

\n<Guild Master>...Tomo is what you would call a weirdo. There are
times when I can't really understand what he's
thinking.

\n<Guild Master>It doesn't seem like he's a bad person or a
heretic...

\n< Serena >So you mean someone who is difficult to get along
with.

\n<Guild Master>Ah... Well, maybe I actually get along with you
better than I thought.
\n< Serena >What do you mean? Well, nevermind. I'm going.
イベント終了
I won't do it
イベント終了
Distribution of Poison en(v[2288]===0)
\n< Serena >Poison is not a gentle request.

\n<Guild Master>Ah, I heard it's been popular lately. I haven't
seen it around here much though.
\n< Serena >Poison is popular?
\n<Guild Master>Don't you know? It's a potion for inheritance.

\n<Guild Master>Ah, I'm in need of money. If only my father-in-law
would die, I would inherit his fortune. Oh,
perfect timing--.
\n< Serena >Enough. So, what about it?

\n<Guild Master>There seems to be some informants. It seems that
there are people who want to bring it into this
town.

\n<Guild Master>It's not suitable for our peaceful town. I would
like you to take it away.

\n<Guild Master>So, this will be a request from the guild.
Actually, me...

\n< Serena >Should I just go in and defeat everyone on the
scene?

\n<Guild Master>Ah, it's perfect for you, miss. A small fry who
doesn't even have any secrets worth washing.
Please go ahead and take care of it to your
heart's content.

\n< Serena >I don't mind, but if it's just small fry like
that, no matter how much we crush them, won't it
only be a temporary solution?

\n< Serena >If you want to stop the influx of poison, we must
cut off the source.

\n<Guild Master>If we could do that, it would be no trouble. Well,
we'll take care of that later.
\n<Guild Master>I'll pay 4G as a reward. Will you take the job?
Accept
I won't take it
Take on
\n< Serena >Alright. I'll take the job.

\n<Guild Master>Thank you. This is the request form. It also has
the location where they will pass written on it.

\n<Guild Master>The location is off the eastern highway. It's
perfect because it's out of sight from people.

\n<Guild Master>They're not much in terms of quantity or quality,
but there's always a chance of something
unexpected. Be careful, okay?

\n< Serena >If I have determined that I will be fine, then you
should leave it to me. Well then, I'll be going.
Not take
Cancel
イベント終了
依頼　妊婦救助後

\n<Guild Master>The request isn't finished yet, right? Come back
once you've completed the request.
イベント終了
Unicorn saddleen(v[2287]===0)
Cancel
Unicorn Saddle en(v[2287]===0)
\n< Serena >Unicorn.
\n<Guild Master>What's wrong, miss? Are you frozen in place?
\n< Serena >Th-this request... I will... take this request.
\n<Guild Master>Oh, okay.

\n< Serena >Give me the documents. The request certificate...
quickly!

\n<Guild Master>It's rare to see you so calm and composed... Here,
this is the document.

\n<Guild Master>It seems that the client is at the inn, so please
ask them directly for more details.
\n< Serena >Ah, thank you, Master. I'm off!
\n<Guild Master>Hmmm?
\n< Serena >Clue, I finally got a clue!

\n< Serena >As I thought, there was no mistake in coming here.
They said the location is at the inn. I must go
and hear the story as soon as possible...!
Cancel
イベント終了
第一部最終依頼　導入
\n< Serena >Master, this is...
\n<Guild Master>....
Emergency Rescue Request
Emergency Rescue Request
Rescue Target: Erika. Rin Route.
\n< Serena >What's going on?
\n<Guild Master>It's just as it looks.

\n<Guild Master>That idiot took on a request to subdue the
thieves, but it seems they failed. They got
caught, apparently.

\n<Guild Master>The woman that Erika rescued came to deliver a
message. Originally, the request was to rescue
this woman.
\n<Guild Master>It's not helpful if you get caught in exchange...

\n<Guild Master>...Adventurers sometimes face situations like
this. That's why it's important to deposit money
at the guild as a precaution in case you mess up.

\n<Guild Master>If I don't come back, please use this money to
request a rescue.

\n<Guild Master>That's why the client for this request is also
Erika.

\n< Serena >Enough with the preamble. Let me hear the
situation.
\n<Guild Master>Are you taking on the request?
\n< Serena >Of course.

\n<Guild Master>This request is different from the ones before.
It's against humans, and there are a lot of them.

\n<Guild Master>Moreover, you need to infiltrate their base and
rescue the hostages. There's no way you can do
stealth operations, kid.
\n< Serena >That's right.

\n<Guild Master>That means you'll have to fight the thieves head-
on.

\n<Guild Master>They're just country thieves. They don't have
impressive equipment, but a group of armed humans
is still a formidable opponent.

\n<Guild Master>Even experienced and accomplished adventurers
usually try to avoid fighting.
\n< Serena >But Erika went to fight. To save that woman.

\n<Guild Master>Ah, because she's an idiot. To her, the opponent
is someone she doesn't even know the name of. I
told her to abandon it.
\n< Serena >Are you planning to say the same thing to me?
\n<Guild Master>....

\n< Serena >Don't make that face, Master. In short, as long as
I'm stronger than all the thieves.
\n< Serena >I have confidence in that.
\n<Guild Master>...Has your determination not changed?

\n< Serena >Even if I can't take on the request here, I'll go
on my own.
\n<Guild Master>Understood.
\n<Guild Master>In that case, let me make a request as well.
\n<Guild Master>Please, help that person.
\n< Serena >Leave it to me.

\n<Guild Master>We're going to infiltrate the thieves' hideout.
Naturally, we'll have to confront them.

\n<Guild Master>But it's not possible to go. If it turns into a
battle, Erika will naturally become a hostage.

\n<Guild Master>If that's the case, no matter how strong the young
lady is, it's a hopeless situation.

\n<Guild Master>That's why securing Erika is the priority. Head
straight towards Erika and rescue her.

\n<Guild Master>And then, take down the approaching thieves. If we
have to fight, this is the order.
\n< Serena >That's only natural.

\n<Guild Master>The thieves have made the ruins in the forest
their base.

\n<Guild Master>Whether it's an ancient temple or a fortress, it's
not that big of a box.

\n<Guild Master>The ruins are built as if they are carrying steep
cliffs on their backs. The surroundings are also
hilly, giving it a balance as if standing in a
hollow.
\n< Serena >Natural fortress, huh.

\n<Guild Master>It's not that impressive. It's just a slope that
you can climb by walking normally.

\n<Guild Master>The reason they made this place their base is
probably because they wanted to hide and sneak
around rather than anything else.

\n< Serena >Isn't it actually convenient for the invading
side?

\n<Guild Master>I suppose so. Especially the cliff side is not
well guarded. This is Erika's estimation, though.

\n<Guild Master>Their plan was to use ropes to quickly descend
from the cliff side, enter the building from the
rooftop, and rescue the hostages.

\n<Guild Master>This rope is rigged with a pulley and a weight.
When you light the fuse from below, the weight
that is fixed above will drop and the rope will
rapidly wind up.

\n<Guild Master>After rescuing the hostages, we were supposed to
go back to the rooftop once more and use this
mechanism to escape all at once. The plan was to
then flee to the town.

\n<Guild Master>Even though they could enter from anywhere around,
they chose to use the cliff. They must have
planned to catch the thieves off guard.
\n< Serena >But we failed.
\n<Guild Master>No, we didn't use it in the first place.

\n<Guild Master>It seems like they found out that a woman was
taken outside and hastily took her back. According
to the woman's account.

\n<Guild Master>Unexpected actions... Did they think it was an
opportunity?... No, they probably just couldn't
stand by and watch...
\n< Serena >Lord Erika...
\n<Guild Master>So the woman escaped, but that person was caught.

\n<Guild Master>Fortunately or unfortunately, thanks to that, the
plan that Erika was supposed to use is still
intact.

\n<Guild Master>It means that he himself will be saved by the plan
he came up with.

\n<Guild Master>If we do this right, we can minimize the battle
with the thieves.

\n< Serena >That's good, but from what I've heard, it seems
quite elaborate... In other words, it seems like a
conspicuous trap.

\n< Serena >Isn't it possible that after Lady Erika was
captured, the rope was found and discarded?

\n<Guild Master>Ah, of course that's an option. But if that's the
case, then you should just come back for now.
\n< Serena >That's right. It was a foolish question.

\n<Guild Master>At that time, we'll have to rethink our strategy.
But well, for now, let's continue assuming certain
things.

\n<Guild Master>The ruins have a three-layer structure. However,
according to the woman, the first and third floors
are heavily deteriorated and hardly used.

\n<Guild Master>It seems that the thieves' sleeping quarters,
storage of loot, and the prison for holding the
woman are all located on the second floor.

\n<Guild Master>Perhaps Erika is also captured in this second
floor prison. However, it seems that even the
woman doesn't have a grasp of the structure inside
the building.

\n<Guild Master>We need to actually infiltrate and search for the
location of the prison.

\n< Serena >If we know just that much, it's enough. We should
infiltrate from the rooftop and search the
uninhabited third floor for Lady Erika.

\n<Guild Master>Ah, but even if we manage to find Erika
successfully, don't rush to rescue her
immediately.
\n< Serena >Why?

\n<Guild Master>It's a common practice among thieves. If they're
about to be captured, there's always someone whose
role is to kill the hostage.
\n< Serena >Despicable...

\n<Guild Master>So, find that person first. You should be able to
tell right away since they'll be carrying a
weapon.

\n< Serena >That's a strange way of putting it. Aren't other
thieves like that too?
\n<Guild Master>Well...probably not.

\n<Guild Master>Thieves, robbers, rapists... Since coming to this
town, that person has been taking care of those
scoundrels one by one.

\n<Guild Master>There were a few requests involving thieves as
well. Although it was a side job of searching for
the infamous monster, the damage inflicted upon
them should have been considerable.

\n<Guild Master>If we capture Erika, and find out what those
vengeful thieves are up to in the prison cell...

\n< Serena >So they're torturing and killing her...! You
bastards...!

\n<Guild Master>If they killed Erika, they would have displayed
her dead body as a warning in an open field.

\n<Guild Master>Regardless of the situation, the fact that it
hasn't happened yet means that person is still
alive.

\n<Guild Master>However, you should think that there isn't much
time left.

\n< Serena >Don't waste a moment. Let's head to the scene
immediately.
\n<Guild Master>Take this too.

\n< Serena >Healing potions, bandages... Ah, all of these
would be necessary for Lady Erika, I suppose.

\n< Serena >What about these potions? I've never seen these
bottles before. Skull marks...?

\n<Guild Master>That's also for Erika. It's a powerful medicine,
so don't ever drink it, okay?

\n< Serena >Do you think I wouldn't notice? Understood. I'll
take care of it.

\n<Guild Master>Ah, that's all I want to give you. The quickest
way to the thieves' hideout is by cutting through
the western forest.

\n< Serena >Yes, understood... I promise to bring that kind
and meddlesome person back here without fail.
\n<Guild Master>Miss... I'm counting on you, Erika.
第一部最終依頼　導入

\n<Guild Master>If you're going to the hideout of the thief gang,
go straight through the western forest. It will
likely turn into a series of battles, so make sure
to prepare yourself properly.

events.note: 依頼の種類とかを教えてくれる

parameters: 序盤依頼三つ進行中

\n< Adventurer >The average daily earnings of a laborer are about
1G. Adventurers risk their lives and earn an
income of 5 to 10G.

\n< Adventurer >Sometimes I wonder, which one of us values our
lives more highly?
ミノタウロスの探索進行中

\n< Adventurer >Transporting supplies, huh? This one will do for
today.

\n< Adventurer >Did you know? Adventurers were originally
merchants, you know.

\n< Adventurer >It seems that the predecessor of the Adventurer's
Guild was the Merchant Guild. In other words,
transportation is the true essence of being an
adventurer.
ミノタウロス捜索後

\n< Adventurer >It seems like the safety in the eastern town is
deteriorating year by year.

\n< Adventurer >Where people gather, money, illness, and crime
come along.

\n< Adventurer >For a king who relies on his subjects, as long as
they pay their taxes, anything else should be
fine, I suppose.
妊婦の話後　後半依頼三つ進行中
\n< Adventurer >Hey, you've gotten the hang of it, haven't you?

\n< Adventurer >Working is a good thing, no matter what. Even the
great scholar says so.
依頼三つ終了・フリーモード進行中

\n< Adventurer >The bridge closure is the lord's order. They said
that young people were crossing the river one
after another, so they hurriedly closed it off.

\n< Adventurer >Why do all of them willingly want to go to the
city?
第一部ラスト　冒険者の救助開始前
\n< Adventurer >Erika, seriously...
\n< Adventurer >So you mean... as a thief... in other words...

\n< Adventurer >Ah, damn it...! But a rescue request like this
is...!
第一部ラスト　冒険者の救助開始後

\n< Adventurer >Did you accept the rescue request... from a girl
like you...
\n< Adventurer >....

events.name: 冒険者女性
events.note: 女性冒険者の心得を教えてくれる

parameters: 序盤依頼三つ進行中
\n<Female Adventurer>What? Lost?

\n<Female Adventurer>There's nothing interesting here. I'm just chasing
after grasshoppers with my friends.
序盤依頼三つ進行中

\n<Female Adventurer>Goblin extermination? Wow, so you took on the
request. I guess that makes you an adventurer...

\n<Female Adventurer>Take a bath right after it's done. Those goblins
seriously stink. Well, I guess that goes without
saying, right?
序盤依頼三つ進行中

\n<Female Adventurer>Have you seen any goblin children? I hope you've
properly exterminated them.

\n<Female Adventurer>If they continue to live, they will only bring
forth sin and suffering.

\n<Female Adventurer>It's an act of mercy and virtue to dispose of them
while they're still children.
ミノタウロスの探索進行中
\n<Female Adventurer>Ah, I'm going on that muscle gorilla's errand.
\n<Female Adventurer>What are you doing holed up in the forest...
ミノタウロス捜索後
\n<Female Adventurer>Minotaur? No, I haven't seen it.

\n<Female Adventurer>So you're saying it was repelled right here
between the forest? It's a close call story, but
well, it's hard to believe.
妊婦の話後　後半依頼三つ進行中

\n<Female Adventurer>Hey there. Looks like I'm getting used to this
adventurer job.
妊婦の話後　後半依頼三つ進行中
\n<Female Adventurer>Orcs...! Are we going to deal with them...?

\n<Female Adventurer>They're all muscular and bulky, like muscle
monsters, right? And they're green too. It's
physically repulsive. I'll pass.
\n<Female Adventurer>At least put on some pants!
依頼三つ終了・フリーモード進行中

\n<Female Adventurer>Didn't you find it strange that there were no
gathering requests?

\n<Female Adventurer>It's because I've been taking on every single one
of them. As soon as they appear. In a matter of
seconds.

\n<Female Adventurer>Actually, recently I've been stockpiling various
medicinal herbs and delivering them as soon as I
accept the request...!
第一部ラスト　冒険者の救助開始前
\n<Female Adventurer>I heard they caught a muscle gorilla?

\n<Female Adventurer>Well, my condolences. Even if you survive, you'll
probably be permanently disabled.

\n<Female Adventurer>That's why we women have to carefully choose our
requests.

\n<Female Adventurer>...What's with that look? If a woman gets caught,
you can imagine what happens, right?

events.name: 冒険者男
events.note: 冒険時の注意事項やらを教えてくれる

parameters: 宿を出てから道具屋に行くまで

\n< Adventurer >Make sure to store potion-like items in an easily
accessible place, okay?

\n< Adventurer >If you plan to use them during battle, make sure
to utilize the slots. If you don't set them up
before the adventure, you won't be able to use
them when the time comes.
ミノタウロスの探索進行中

\n< Adventurer >In our guild, there's a blonde adventurer named
Ricotte. Despite being a woman, she was
unexpectedly strong.

\n< Adventurer >She goes on business trips and adventures all over
the place, so she's become a bit of a celebrity.

\n< Adventurer >However, just the other day, I fought and died
against a monster called a Minotaur. Right here in
this town.

\n< Adventurer >I often wonder what being an adventurer is all
about. No matter how strong you are, when it's
time to die, it happens in an instant.
ミノタウロス捜索後

\n< Adventurer >It seems like Erika and the Master have known each
other for a long time.

\n< Adventurer >There must have been some connection between them
through Ricott. Well, it seems like both of them
don't want to talk about Ricott.
妊婦の話後　後半依頼三つ進行中

\n< Adventurer >If you're an adventurer, it's only natural to
experience failures. In fact, failures are more
common than successes.

\n< Adventurer >I heard that even top-class adventurers have a
success rate of only about 60%.

\n< Adventurer >For us who are below third-rate, it's only natural
to be even worse. In that case, we have to think
about how to deal with failures.

\n< Adventurer >Even if you fail, life doesn't end. It won't end.
Remember that well.
妊婦の話後　後半依頼三つ進行中

\n< Adventurer >There are still few violent monsters around here.
Thanks to the river to the east acting as a
breakwater.

\n< Adventurer >Once you cross the river, it's like a completely
different world. The monsters become ferocious,
and the humans who fight against them also become
ferocious.

\n< Adventurer >They say that they don't have any trouble with
work because of that. But I prefer a laid-back
life of poverty, it suits me better.
依頼三つ終了・フリーモード進行中

\n< Adventurer >Thieves can generally be classified into three
types: former mercenaries, former nobles, and
former adventurers.

\n< Adventurer >The thieves around here are a bunch of former
adventurers. Among them, there are some worthless
ones who were kicked out from Kawahigashi.

\n< Adventurer >However, when humans gather, they become a threat
in themselves. The guild here is not enough to
deal with them.

\n< Adventurer >The days of waiting with bated breath for the lord
to come and subdue them, well...
第一部ラスト　冒険者の救助開始前

\n< Adventurer >It seems being a lord is tough these days. This
thing called gold coins seems to be the cause of
it.

\n< Adventurer >In the past, having abundant crops was considered
the power of a lord. But gold coins don't just
sprout from rice fields. They're not part of a
lord's domain, you know.

\n< Adventurer >The world's rules have changed from wheat to gold
coins.

\n< Adventurer >So from now on, the world will no longer be
dominated by nobles. It will be the era of
merchants and cities, the so-called third
estate... or so they say.
第一部ラスト　冒険者の救助開始後
\n< Adventurer >Wasn't the young lady close with Erika?

\n< Adventurer >Well, it might be pointless advice, but I'll say
it just in case.

\n< Adventurer >An adventurer who can't abandon their friends
won't live long.

\n< Adventurer >It's our motto... Ah, I know, I know. You don't
have to ask.
\n< Serena >I have no business here.
\n< Serena >It's a bag.

\n< Serena >The contents are empty. I suppose you can put
money in here and give it to adventurers as a
reward.

\n< Serena >...Come to think of it, this bag itself might have
a decent price.

\n< Serena >The price of the bag might be deducted from the
reward. It doesn't really matter to me though.
\n< Serena >Here's the request document.

\n< Serena >If you take this and go to the client's place, it
will serve as proof that I am the contractor for
the request.

\n< Serena >After the completion of the request, I will
receive the client's signature and bring it back.
It's a completely rational system.
\n< Serena >Scroll... No, it's just a piece of paper.

\n< Serena >It seems like this is something you can use to
write and make notes on the map. Of course, it's
not free.
\n< Serena >Made of sturdy parchment.
\n< Serena >It's a bag.

\n< Serena >I'm taking out coins from inside and counting or
looking at them.
\n< Serena >I feel like you shouldn't stare so much.
\n< Serena >I have a request.
\n< Serena >Delivery request to a distant place.
\n< Serena >It's a request that I have no use for.
\n< Serena >I have a request.
\n< Serena >Mercenary recruitment.

\n< Serena >It seems that we, as the Adventurer's Guild, are
organizing a mercenary corps to be dispatched to
the battlefield.

\n< Serena >This is a request that has nothing to do with me
in any way.
\n< Serena >I have a request.
\n< Serena >Bounty hunting.

\n< Serena >It's not something I know how much time it will
take to explore. I'll pass on this.
\n< Serena >I have a request.

\n< Serena >Babysitter. Someone with experience in childbirth
and good milk production.

\n< Serena >Why would such a request be made to the
Adventurer's Guild...? Is there someone who would
take it? It's impossible for me, though.
\n< Serena >Here's the map.

\n< Serena >This is a rough... I mean, really rough map of the
area.

\n< Serena >Detailed maps are classified for territorial
defense purposes. That's why there is a demand
even for these vague maps.
\n< Serena >It's a barrel.

\n< Serena >When I pushed it with my hand, it moved a little.
It seems empty inside.
\n< Serena >Here's some alcohol.

\n< Serena >I don't really like alcohol. It just makes me feel
sick.

\n< Serena >I think it's great to be born in a place with good
water. The water around here is also good.
\n< Serena >Let's not get involved with the counter.

\n< Serena >I don't think we'll get scolded, but I'm sure it
will trouble the Master.
